title: Limbaugh Recommends Audience Try a ‘Drive-By Media Fast’: ‘Avoid the Crap That Pollutes’ the News
text:
Limbaugh Recommends Audience Try a ‘Drive-By Media Fast’: ‘Avoid the Crap That Pollutes’ the News by Josh Feldman | 6:48   
In responding to a caller talking about media coverage of President Trump today, Rush Limbaugh advised his audience they should just avoid paying too much attention to the mainstream media. 
“Do you want to live a better life? Do you really want to have a normal, optimistic outlook on life every day?” he asked. “Don’t watch that stuff! Don’t watch CNN. Don’t read the New York Times . If you look at Drudge and if you see headlines that portend the end of the world tomorrow, don’t click on it. Just avoid the crap that pollutes the daily so-called news that comes from left-wing news organizations.” 
He said trying that would “dramatically improve” one’s outlook on life, telling people, “You don’t need to expose yourself to it. That’s one of the many reasons I’m here. I know how to do this without it ruining my life. I know how to do this without it ruining my day. That’s why I’m here to run interference, to be the boundaries for you.” 
But Limbaugh admitted that he can’t bring himself to watch some of it anymore because of how “predictable” and “boring” and “lame” it’s become.
